name: Lynx - Style
description:
Did you know that not all my LoRAs are hosted on CivitAI? Check out my Patreon to learn more!

What's this LoHA

This is a LoRA trained on a particular style. It creates anime illustrations with a modern style oriented towards 2.5d.

The images in the examples are created using only this LoHA and different models (mainly my custom):

  • https://civitai.com/models/24149

  • https://civitai.com/models/26332

  • https://civitai.com/models/28322

  • https://civitai.com/models/32022

  • https://civitai.com/models/33707

You don't need to specify a word to trigger this LoHA, but if you want to increment its effect you can add "inzaniak" to your prompts.

The LoRA works well on NSFW.

What's this trained on

This LoRA was trained on AI pictures. The pictures were generated using a mixture of my Mistoon_Anime model and some of mine + 3rd party LoRAs.

Here's a sneak peek of the dataset for those of you who wants to get an idea of what to expect from the model:

Guides

Learn how to create pictures like mine with my step-by-step tutorials:

  • Beginner's Guide

  • Prompting

  • High Resolution

  • Inpainting

  • ControlNet

  • My Workflow

If you want to create images with a high LoRA weight, I highly suggest you to check the tutorial.

Support

If you want to support my work, you can check out my music here:

https://inzaniak.bandcamp.com/

You can also check my AI Art accounts, where you'll find daily pictures made with my models (and previews of new ones coming):

  • DeviantArt

  • Patreon

This LoRA was made possible by the support from my Patrons:
